name: Metal Glove: Exodus (Fink)
description:
Metal Glove: Exodus is my senior capstone project.

I collaborated with six other game design students to create this game. Inspired by Gauntlet: Slayer Edition, we tried to make something that prioritized hack-and-slash combat mechanics and treacherous dungeon exploration.

After four months of hard work, this was our result.
